onBoardingScreen.possessWalletText: If you already have an Ethereum wallet, you can connect it to Pozzle Planet
onBoardingScreen.generalizedOption1: ∙ your specific location never sent from your phone
onBoardingScreen.generalizedOption2: ∙ your specific location is converted to a general location (e.g town or state) by your phone before being sent
onBoardingScreen.web3Address: The wallet address that is holding pozzleplanet.eth is

newWalletConfirmation.title: New to Pozzle Planet?
newWalletConfirmation.description: On Pozzle Planet you earn $POZ when you make a pozitive impact on the world!
newWalletConfirmation.description2: If you are new to having a digital crypto wallet, we’ll create one for you. Otherwise you can connect a wallet you already own.

successWallet.title: Wallet Created Successfully!
successWallet.description: Make sure to backup your wallet later in settings. For now, let’s continue to setup your Pozzle Planet Profile.

name.prompt: We'll start with a unique username and your pronouns

picture.title: Next let’s Add a profile photo

bio.title: To complete your profile you can add a bio

location.title: enable location and join worldwide pozitivity
location.description: We only use a generalised version of locations shared so that we can help local communities connect with pozitive actions relevent to them

completed.title: You’re all set up!
completed.subtitle: Now you can join pozitive activities, explore pozzle planets, pledge $POZ, and much more!

camera.message: We need your permission to use your camera
camera.title: Permission to use camera

audio.message: We need your permission to use your microphone
audio.title: Permission to use audio recording

misc.notAuthorizedView: Give Permissions to the Camera and Microphone

videoScreen.deletePozzleVideo: You will be deleting the Pozzle

camera.cameraPermissionMessage: We need your permission to use your camera
camera.audioPermissionMessage: We need your permission to record your audio

pozzlePledgeSheet.information: Each activity has a pool of $POZ that users pledge towards. After the activity is sent to a Pozzle Planet and the Pozzle Planet is completed, each user who has created a Pozzle attatched to the activity is distributed a proportional percentage of the activity’s $POZ pool.

signMessage.title: Verify your wallet
signMessage.description: Your external wallet wants to verify your address by making a signature request. Tap continue and you will be taken to your wallet app to verify.

success.title: wallet successfully connected
success.description: Woohoo! Your wallet has successfully been connected! Let’s continue to setup your Pozzle Planet Profile..

BackupWalletConfirmation.title: Back up your wallet
BackupWalletConfirmation.description: You now have a new digital crypto wallet! To make sure you don’t lose it you can back it up

BackupWallet.title: Your secret phrase
BackupWallet.description: These words are the password to your wallet! Copy them down somewhere safe and secure.
BackupWallet.description2: Don’t give anyone else these words otherwise they will have access to your entire wallet!
